text: Departure Yard railway station () is located near Baloch Colony flyover on Sharah-e-Faisal in Karachi, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Karachi Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Departure Yard railway station
